Name: Ecosys Training Center Entrollment System
Description: A system to manage the enrollment of students in various training programs offered by Ecosys.
Author: Ecosys Team

Components.Name: Instructor Management
Components.Description: Manages the instructors who will teach the courses, including their profiles and availability.

Components.Name: Course Management
Components.Description: Manages the creation, updating, and deletion of training courses.

Components.Name: Enrollment Management
Components.Description: Handles student enrollments in courses, including payment processing.

Components.Name: Reporting
Components.Description: Generates reports on enrollments, course popularity, and user statistics.

Components.Name: Settings Management
Components.Description: Manages system settings, including user roles and permissions.

Components.Name: User Management
Components.Description: Handles user registration, authentication, and profile management.

Components.Name: Notification System
Components.Description: Sends notifications to users about course updates, enrollment confirmations, and reminders.
